name: Firefly 100 Nature Hot Spots In British Columbia
categories: 100 Nature Hot Spots In British Columbia
description: 100 Nature Hot Spots in British Columbia is an illustrated guide to BC's most popular nature getaways and best-kept secrets. Each entry includes a descriptive destination profile, colour photographs and handy information about special features and their locations. The hot spots are divided into six chapters: Vancouver Island and the coast; central BC; Lower Mainland; Okanagan and Similkameen region; Kootenay region; and northern BC. Ideal for those eager to discover new places in British Columbia to hike, photograph wildlife, camp and paddle.
